title: Coast to Coast Radio Program! Commercial Free! Jun 2nd thru Jun
description:
Yes folks, late in the week, but here at last! Ten more broadcasts of now the 2nd most listened to radio program in the entire world! Yes folks, Coast to Coast AM! It&#039;s really amazing that a paranormal radio program is 2nd only to the politics of Rush Limbaugh. Well anyway, Download, SEED, and Enjoy and spread these torrents all around the internet and make Coast to Coast the #1 radio program in the world! Until next week again my friends.......... Stokeman Out.......

Monday June 2nd, 2008
Spirituality & Science
Appearing during the middle two hours, Professor of Psychiatry at Harvard Medical School, Dr. George Vaillant discussed his work on the scientific effects of positive emotions, as well as his new book Spiritual Evolution. Humankind&#039;s sense of spirituality... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Dr. George Vaillant, Billy Gibbons, Lionel Fanthorpe

Tuesday June 3rd, 2008
The Border Crisis
Author Jerome Corsi and filmmaker Chris Burgard discussed the making of Border, an investigative documentary on the turbulent state of America&#039;s southern border with Mexico. Burgard&#039;s film shows all sides of the border dilemma and included interviews... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Jerome Corsi, Chris Burgard, John M. Curtis, Alex Jones

Wednesday June 4th, 2008
Variety Show
A special evening featured four separate guests covering such topics as spy chips, ghosts, food & energy, and ancient Lemuria. In the first hour, privacy advocate Katherine Albrecht reported on how cell phones can be used to track people&#039;s locations... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Alex Jones, Katherine Albrecht, Mary Ann Winkowski, Howard Bloom, Glenn Kimball

Thursday June 5th, 2008
Bobby Kennedy&#039;s Assassination
During the middle two hours, Irish writer and filmmaker Shane O&#039;Sullivan discussed his investigation into the many unsolved questions in the assassination of Robert Kennedy, which occurred 40 years ago on June 6, 1968. In the beginning everyone assumed... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Shane OÃƒÂ¢??Sullivan, Alex Jones, Jim Berkland

Friday June 6th, 2008
Dark Shadows, Time Travel, & ESP
In the first half of the show author, professor of journalism, and columnist, Frank Borzellieri discussed his new book The Physics of Dark Shadows: Time Travel, ESP and the Laboratory. He pointed out how many of the bizarre supernatural occurrences on... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Frank Borzellieri, Open Lines

Saturday June 7th, 2008
Crystal Skulls & UFOs
Expert in anomalous phenomena, Paul Stonehill discussed his latest research into the Nazi hunt for crystal skulls in South America, including his knowledge of UFO research by the Soviets during the Cold War and the mysterious giants that inhabit Eurasian... 
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): Paul Stonehill, Carol Simontacchi

Sunday June 8th, 2008
Meet Jesus Christ
Ian Punnett was joined by Jesus Christ, who discussed his life and teachings. Regarding the various interpretations of his time on Earth, Christ said, "there is specificity to who I am, the things I did, the things I said, and a purpose for which I... 
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): Jesus Christ, Captain Kelly Sweeney

Monday June 9th, 2008
ET Interference
During the middle two hours, visionary and conduit for divine messages, Marshall Vian Summers discussed how ET forces are influencing world events and capitalizing on human frailty in order to gain control of Earth. He first received "briefings" from... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Marshall Vian Summers, Jordan Maxwell, Alex Jones, Jerome Corsi

Tuesday June 10th, 2008
Accidents, Risk, & Prevention
Writer Marc Gerstein was joined by co-author Michael Ellsberg and his father Daniel Ellsberg to discuss their book on major accidents and catastrophes, and how they often could be prevented. For example, the death of students from the recent China quake...
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Marc Gerstein, Michael Ellsberg, Daniel Ellsberg, Douglas Powell

Wednesday June 11th, 2008
Pyramid Research & Theories
Dr. John DeSalvo, Director of the Great Pyramid of Giza Research Assoc., discussed the latest findings in pyramid research including the Russian pyramids. The Russians built around 17 fiberglass pyramids and conducted experiments inside them. They found... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): John DeSalvo, Beatrice Lydecker
